text: Radholsavam is a 1995 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P. Anil and Babu Narayanan, starring Suresh Gopi and Maathu in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Suresh Gopi as Muthukrishnan * Vijayaraghavan as Chandutty * Kasthuri as Chembakam * Maathu as Meenakshi * Spadikam George as Bhargavan *Kundara Johny as Katturan *Jose Pellissery as Sayippu Vasu *Geetha Vijayan as Seethamma *Cochin Haneefa as Chappani Kunjambu *Indrans == Music == ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Radholsavam
